name: Imtex
description: Imtex provide IT Support, Solutions and Services to small and medium business clients. Imtex have been providing IT Services since 1990 and hold industry accreditations from Microsoft and Cisco as well as partner status with key technology providers - McAfee, Eset, Draytek, Netgear, Dell, HP, Toshiba. Imtex offer solutions for businesses whether they have in house IT support or not. From providing a full Managed IT Service to filling the gaps in your in-house IT team or technologies.
